body_html: A better way to make this compile in the meantime is to just add the cuda crt include path to the cxxopts as I have done in the Arch Linux package: https://git.archlinux.org/svntogit/community.git/commit/trunk/PKGBUILD?h=packages/tensorflow&id=530561e9e6bac127d1091f206f6214c967072833

body: A better way to make this compile in the meantime is to just add the cuda crt include path to the cxxopts as I have done in the Arch Linux package: https://git.archlinux.org/svntogit/community.git/commit/trunk/PKGBUILD?h=packages/tensorflow&id=530561e9e6bac127d1091f206f6214c967072833
